Description.Details: Based on one of the most Ancient Electronic Countermeasures, these rockets carry a payload of Chaff and release a blinding strobe light on detonation to fool any and all kinds of Sensors. Upon receiving a Critical Hit, any remaining ammunition stored inside an Ammo Bin will explode dealing damage to the install location. Risk can be mitigated with the use of C.A.S.E. Left Click on Ammo count during battle to swap Ammo Type. Ctrl+click on ammunition counter to eject ammo.
Description.Name: LRM Chaff Ammo
